column4: The taxonomic name of the organism used in the Dataset or from which the starting biological material derives.
If Other was selected in Organism, list any other organisms that were used in this Dataset. Terms from the NCBI Taxonomy are recommended.
If Other was selected in Strain, list any other strains that were used in this Dataset.
If Other was selected in Sample Type, list any other sample types that were used in this Dataset.
If applicable, Tissues or anatomical sources used.
If Other was selected in Tissue Source, list any other tissue sources that were used in this Dataset.
If Other was selected in Cell Line, list any other cell lines that were used in this Dataset.
Brief description of sample rearing and/or collection.
Path to file, or link e.g. (URL or DOI) for the complete protocol of organism rearing and/or collection.
